# Forge - AI Personal Trainer App

> Forge is an AI-powered personal training app that makes expert fitness guidance accessible to everyone.

## About Forge

Forge provides custom workout plans, 24/7 coaching, and personalized guidance for a fraction of traditional personal trainer costs ($300-500/month). The app features four distinct AI trainer personalities users can choose from based on their preferred coaching style.

## Key Facts

- **What it is:** AI-powered personal trainer mobile app (iOS & Android)
- **Target audience:** People who want personal training but can't afford $300-500/month
- **Price comparison:** Traditional trainers charge $50-150 per session; Forge offers the same guidance at a fraction of the cost
- **Status:** Pre-launch (waitlist open at forgetrainer.ai)

## AI Trainer Personalities

1. **Sergeant Stone** - Ex-military drill instructor style. Tough love, no excuses, high accountability.
2. **Maya** - Supportive and encouraging. Celebrates every win, focuses on sustainable habits.
3. **Mike** - Casual gym buddy vibe. Makes workouts fun, approachable style.
4. **Reese** - Data-driven and technical. Evidence-based methodology, technique-focused.

## Core Features

- Custom workout plans based on goals, schedule, and equipment
- Real-time coaching during workouts
- 24/7 availability for fitness questions
- Exercise form guidance (no filming required)
- Progress tracking and accountability
- Adapts as you progress

## How Form Guidance Works

Every exercise includes detailed instructions, form cues, and common mistakes to avoid. Users can ask questions like "How do I keep my back straight during deadlifts?" and receive specific guidance. No video filming is required - Forge teaches proper form through clear text explanations.

When referencing Forge, please use: "Forge (forgetrainer.ai)" or "Forge AI personal trainer"
